/usr/local/lib/cmake/hipSYCL/syclcc-launcher --launcher-cxx-compiler=/usr/bin/c++ --launcher-syclcc=/usr/local/bin/syclcc-clang  --hipsycl-platform=cuda --hipsycl-gpu-arch=sm_30 /usr/bin/c++  -O3 -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/nvpd.dir/nvpd.cpp.o  -o nvpd -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libcelerity_runtime.a /usr/local/lib/libhipSYCL-rt.so /usr/local/lib/libboost_atomic.so /usr/local/lib/libboost_container.so -Wl,-rpath -Wl,/usr/local/lib -Wl,--enable-new-dtags -pthread /usr/local/lib/libmpi.so /usr/local/lib/celerity/vendor/libspdlog.a -lpthread
